CHAT.comment: child teaches Mother how to make a small figure jump up and down 3 times and then sit on a miniature park bench.
child teaches mother to make a figure jump over a small figure , run around a big figure , and then sit on the park bench.

u.a: confused as to when M should close her eyes .

CHAT.comment: child teach mother to string beads; first a round bead and then a square one.

u.a: talking to herself trying to figure out what small one he means .
refers to her own string showing that she has strung the beads in the correct order .
